General¶

Grabs text from the Gutenberg Project to use as a plaintext.

cccenter.python.general.generate_paragraph()¶

Generates a random paragraph from the Gutenberg Project

Returns:Text the Guttenberg Project with spaces and non-alphabetic characters removed and all characters lower case
Return type:str
